com.percussion.integration
Class PSField

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.integration.PSField

public class PSField
extends Object

This class is used to store the seperate pieces of return data from a PSSearch object. The fields are actually the internal Rhythmyx name of fields with the potential to hold the value returned as well.

Constructor Detail

PSField

public PSField(String name,
               String value)
Construct a PSField object, with only a name and sometimes a value. This is used for query result fields and for result fields, @see PSSearch for more information.

Parameters:
name - the specific field to store, this is the Rhythmyx field name used during a search, assumed not null or empty
value - the value of the specified field, may be null or empty

PSField

public PSField(String name,
               String value,
               String operator,
               String connector)
Construct a PSField object, with a complete set of information. This is used for query fields, @see PSSearch for more information.

Parameters:
name - the specific field to store, this is the Rhythmyx field name used during a search, assumed not null or empty
value - the value of the specified field, may be null or empty
operator - used to compare the value within the system to the value for the specified field, the defualt is "like", may be null or empty, @see sys_SearchParameters.xsd schema for more information
connector - used to join the query fields together, may be null or empty, @see sys_SearchParameters.xsd schema for more information
Method Detail

toHTML

public String toHTML(String headerName)
Convert this field to it's HTML equivalent. If the headerName parameter is not null or empty, we return column header HTML, otherwise we return the value as table definition (TD) HTML.

Parameters:
headerName - the name of the column header for this field, may be null or empty
Returns:
an HTML string representing this cell within a table, never null or empty

addHTMLAttribute

public void addHTMLAttribute(String attribute)
Adds an attribute to the current set of attributes associated with this field.

Parameters:
attribute - the HTML representation of an attribute, assumed not null or empty, the spaceseparator will be added by this routine automatically

clearHTMLAttributes

public void clearHTMLAttributes()
Clears the current attributes for this search field.

addHeaderHTMLAttribute

public void addHeaderHTMLAttribute(String attribute)
Adds an attribute to the current set of attributes associated with this field's header value.

Parameters:
attribute - the HTML representation of an attribute, assumed not null or empty, the spaceseparator will be added by this routine automatically

clearHeaderHTMLAttributes

public void clearHeaderHTMLAttributes()
Clears the current attributes for this search field header.

getName

public String getName()
Get the name of this field, this is the Rhythmyx internal field name.

Returns:
the name string, never null or empty

getValue

public String getValue()
Get the value of this field.

Returns:
the value of this field, may be null or empty

getOperator

public String getOperator()
Get the operator of this field. The default is "like".

Returns:
the operator of this field, may be null or empty

getConnector

public String getConnector()
Get the connector of this field. The default is "and".

Returns:
the connector of this field, may be null or empty
